Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Relates to the construction of facilities for chemical dependence services that promote the privacy of individuals
Summary: Relates to the construction of facilities for chemical dependence services that promote the privacy of individuals while bathing, sleeping, using restrooms and receiving individual counseling services, while also allowing for maximization of the use of such facility.
LawCode: Amd ยง32.29, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the construction of facilities for chemical dependence services that promote the privacy of individuals
